Food Grade


Many of our projects require food grade ISO tanks for transport, sanitation and production in the food and beverage industry. We provide several types of tanks and customized options for all heating, cooling and blending of materials in a variety of sizes.


Each food grade tank’s stainless steel surfaces and valves are detergent washed, cleaned, buffed, and passivated to achieve a clean, dry interior free of prior cargo odor, residue, and any transferable stains. Passivation is 100% and all gaskets and seals are replaced with PTFE (Teflon). Built for transport, ISO tanks have a very long life span and have never leaked in storage.


We can provide client references across the honey and other food industries who are beyond satisfied with food grade tanks for blending and mixing systems.


Contact us

Chemical & Petroleum


Stainless steel ISO tanks are ideal for chemical, petroleum, and petrochemical storage and transport and are ready to use upon arrival. Unlike carbon steel, ISO tanks will not react with the contents and contaminate the metal.​ ISO tanks resist water treatment, chemicals, and can easily tolerate abrasive wash-down solvents and are not impacted by excessive temperatures or UV exposure. They maintain their shape and integrity over years of use, do not rust, and are easy to fill/empty in all weather environments. They resist flames for over seven (7) minutes! Under the same testing conditions poly-composite tanks are compromised in just ninety (90) seconds.


Another advantage of stainless steel tanks is that they can be reclaimed to help reduce the environmental impact of your operations while plastics cannot. Each of our tanks come with:


  • locking three (3) inch bottom discharge valve
  • twenty (20) inch manway
  • pressure safety relief valves
  • air purge/vent valves
  • heat channels
  • two (2) inches of insulation
    • Contact us

    Specialty Tanks


    When you need an out-of-the-box solution, ROAM has 26 years of hands-on engineering experience to meet your needs. We can customize ISO tank size, orientation, and functional abilities like additional heating channels, clean in place systems, sight glasses and more. For smaller operations, we offer you a more cost effective way to scale your manufacturing by refurbishing tanks to your specifications.


    We are also able to source prefabricated OEM specialty tanks, such as helium tanks, cryogenic tanks, refrigerated tanks, and swap-body tanks and deliver them turnkey to your location. Ready to use upon arrival, ISO tanks are versatile, durable and easy to maintain once installed.


    Contact us

    Aseptic


    Aseptic tanks utilize vacuum loading and discharge for the controlled transportation of bulk foods and beverages. Aseptic tanks may be right for you if your product is similar to these popular examples:


  • Concentrated Fruit Juice
  • Food & Beverage Colorants
  • Dairy Products
  • Alcoholic Beverages
  • Sweeteners
  • Edible Oils

    • Contact us

    Vertical Tanks


    Need to maximize your floor space or take advantage of gravity to add pressure to discharge your product? We specialize in converting a normally horizontal tank to vertical, particularly for food and beverage production and storage but also for chemical needs. The process takes between 4-6 weeks for a standard size tank, but we can create a smaller custom tank if your facility has height constraints. Some common use cases for vertical tanks include:


  • Reactors
  • Separators
  • Mixers
  • Brewers

    • Contact us

    Chassis


    Need a chassis to pick up your tank, or just for your day-to-day transportation?


    We have a large selection of affordable used and refurbished chassis to choose based on your needs, including double and tri-axles. Chassis are the safe and legal way to haul your tank empty or loaded.
